trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9SigningTime class defines the signing date and time of a signature.
trans-unit.target: La classe Pkcs9SigningTime definisce la data e l'ora di una firma.

trans-unit.source: A Pkcs9SigningTime object can be used as an authenticated attribute of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"></xref> object when an authenticated date and time are to accompany a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto Pkcs9SigningTime può essere utilizzato come attributo autenticato di una <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner"> </xref> quando una data e ora autenticate devono che una firma digitale dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A signing time attribute is also available in CAPICOM.
trans-unit.target: Un attributo della fase di firma disponibile anche in CAPICOM.

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9SigningTime constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore Pkcs9SigningTime crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> class has the following default property values.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>classe ha i seguenti valori di proprietà predefiniti.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime%2A>|The current date and time| If you want to specify a specific date and time for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> object, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore predefinito | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime%2A>| La data e ora correnti | Se si desidera specificare una data specifica e l'ora per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>oggetto, usare il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29>costruttore.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9SigningTime constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class by using the specified array of byte values as the encoded signing date and time of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore Pkcs9SigningTime crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"> </xref> classe usando la matrice di valori di byte specificata come codificato firma data e ora del contenuto di un messaggio CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that specifies the encoded signing date and time of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di valori di byte che specifica la codifica di firma data e ora del messaggio CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9SigningTime constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"></xref> class by using the specified signing date and time.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore Pkcs9SigningTime crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime"> </xref> classe utilizzando la firma data e ora specificate.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> structure that represents the signing date and time of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime>struttura che rappresenta la data e l'ora della firma.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo sostituisce corrente <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>oggetto con l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"> </xref> oggetto da cui copiare le informazioni.

trans-unit.source: The SigningTime property retrieves a <xref:System.DateTime> structure that represents the date and time that the message was signed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà recupera SigningTime un <xref:System.DateTime>struttura che rappresenta la data e ora in cui il messaggio è stato firmato.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> structure that contains the date and time the document was signed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime>struttura che contiene la data e ora il documento è stato firmato.</xref:System.DateTime>
